title: The trans teen drama that pulls no punches
summary: What It Feels Like For A Girl, a coming-of-age BBC drama, is a visceral look at English working-class life when you don't fit in.

title: Seven of the best LGBTQ+ spaces in Berlin
summary: DJ Cormac, a star in Berlin's queer dance music scene, shares a guide of spots from gay saunas to a body art studio.

title: Village People: The band that brought gay sex to pop
summary: Critic Jack King explains why, for all their cheesy reputation, the YMCA hitmakers fire him up like few others.
